body: I got banned :( but also I donated. This is not fair. I paid my money to get a rank and now I'm banned. I could possibly take this to court, but I don't think I will. I was wondering if there's any way of getting a refund. Alternatively, I paid for gold and so did my brother randjminecraft, so I was wandering if I could make his rank emerald to make his life better. I don't think a refund is realistic BUT PLEASE TRANSFERE GOLD ON MY ACC TO EMERALD ON RANDJS. thanks

Also, when I used my side-modification and got temp banned I didn't make a forum post about it because I took responsibility and accepted the punishment, something you seem incapable of doing.

replies.body: You should know by now that advertising is against the rules on Avicus and it is an instant perm ban. Stop making posts about it and email support@avicus.net.
replies.body_tagged: You should know by now that advertising is against the rules on Avicus and it is an instant perm ban. Stop making posts about it and email support@avicus.net.

replies.body: As a donator, you receive no special privileges when being punished. You should've thought of breaking the rules and the consequences following before doing so. Your donor rank cannot be transferred to another account or be terminated for a refund.
replies.body_tagged: As a donator, you receive no special privileges when being punished. You should've thought of breaking the rules and the consequences following before doing so. Your donor rank cannot be transferred to another account or be terminated for a refund.

replies.body:
""I've decided I will hopefully go on mcpvp and hope for the better. I would like to thank all players on the avicus community who have made me feel welcome. Ever since the start, avicus Avicore and mczone have been amazing servers that I really enjoyed. The time has ended. It's over. Sometimes in life things happen that are wrong to you; you just have to accept it. This will be my last ever post on avicus. Best of luck, funky 
PS I WILL BE STILL MAINTAINING MY YOUTUBE ACCOUNT (BlackSniperPvP)""

This will be my last ever post on avicus.
